description: Microsoft has released Windows Server Insider Preview 26040, the first Windows Server 2025 build for admins enrolled in its Windows Insider program. [...]
title: Microsoft releases first Windows Server 2025 preview build

description: Microsoft has launched flighting for Windows Server systems enrolled in its Windows Insider open software testing program. [...]
title: Microsoft introduces flighting for Windows Server insiders

description: Microsoft is investigating an ongoing and widespread outage impacting the users of its Teams communication platform and causing connectivity issues, login problems, and message delays. [...]
title: Microsoft Teams outage causes connection issues, message delays

description: The Main Intelligence Directorate of Ukraine's Ministry of Defense claims that pro-Ukrainian hacktivists breached the Russian Center for Space Hydrometeorology, aka "planeta" (планета), and wiped 2 petabytes of data. [...]
title: Ukraine: Hack wiped 2 petabytes of data from Russian research center

description: Microsoft confirmed that the Russian Foreign Intelligence Service hacking group, which hacked into its executives' email accounts in November 2023, also breached other organizations as part of this malicious campaign. [...]
title: Microsoft reveals how hackers breached its Exchange Online accounts

description: Leveraging open source solutions and tools to build a cybersecurity architecture offers organizations several benefits. Learn more from Wazuh about the benefits of open source solutions. [...]
title: Role of Wazuh in building a robust cybersecurity architecture

description: The first edition of Pwn2Own Automotive has ended with competitors earning $1,323,750 for hacking Tesla twice and demoing 49 zero-day bugs in multiple electric car systems between January 24 and January 26. [...]
title: Pwn2Own Automotive: $1.3M for 49 zero-days, Tesla hacked twice
